mapper.insert: insert into board values(#{board_id}, #{id}, #{comments}, sysdate, #{board_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from board order by BOARD_DATE desc
select board.*, board_photo.BOARD_IMAGE detail_image from board left join board_photo on board.board_id = board_photo.board_id where board.board_id = #{board_id}
select board.board_id, count(board_like.id) as count from board left join board_like on board.board_id = board_like.board_id group by board.board_id

select * from board_like
id = #{id} and board_id = #{board_id}
